name: power-up-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Raises the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the user’s Attack by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.x_y: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Striking opponents over and over makes the user’s fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.
